project.name: cp-scm-cvs
project.description: cp Ant build and deployment management system (BDMS) configuration file for source control management (SCM) using the Subversion version/revision control tool.

target.name: scm.init
target.description: Initializes a Codeprimate project directory for source control management.

target.name: add
target.description: Adds a file, directory or a group of files and directories to source control.

target.name: checkout
target.description: Checks out a working copy of a source code repository.

target.name: commit
target.description: Checks in all source code file modifications in the working copy to the source code repository.

target.name: export
target.description: Exports a source code repository for archival purposes.

target.name: import
target.description: Imports the project home directory into the source code repository.

target.name: remove
target.description: Removes a file or directory from source control.

target.name: update
target.description: Updates the working copy of the source code repository.
